page.title: 14Buildings in PAUNTLEY
page.content:
Black and White timber framed houses account for{10%}of the houses but the majority of buildings are of brick. Stone built houses account for almost {10%.}There are{3}timber houses. Concrete blocks are used for{1}house. Modern building materials eg asbestos are mostly used for extensions to existing property. Houses date from pre-1500{(1),}1501- 1700{(16),}1701-1900{(38),}1901-1960 {(27)}to{(20)}post 1961.
Building styles reflect the dates and one resident expressed concern that house designs "should be more closely controlled to fit in with the area".
There are{3}"tied cottages",{1}council house,{3}privately rented houses and the remainder are owner occupied.
